alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Prince William, Manassas, Manassas Park; Stafford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 09 at 9:19PM EST until January 10 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides up to 4 feet above normal. Moderate tidal flooding is expected along the Prince William and Stafford county coastlines during tonight`s high tide cycle * WHERE...Stafford and Central and Southeast Prince William/Manassas/Manassas Park Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 6 AM EST Wednesday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure will be inundated. Some shoreline erosion will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides up to 4 feet above normal. Moderate tidal flooding is expected along the Prince William and Stafford county coastlines during tonight`s high tide cycle
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Prince William, Manassas, Manassas Park; Stafford
